p: Additionally, synergy was also noted for another two interactions, namely GR-EO in combination with Chloramphenicol against B. subtilis (FICI of 0.38), and with Streptomycin against S. aureus (FICI of 0.38). Staphylococcus aureus is a major human pathogen that causes a wide range of clinical infections. It is a leading cause of bacteremia and infective endocarditis as well as osteoarticular, skin and soft tissue, pleuropulmonary, and device-related infections [ 34]. Therefore, treatment options of S. aureus infections could include combined use of GR-EO and Streptomycin.
